atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_01:
So, Penny! How’d you wind up friends with
[VAR TRNAME(0000)], anyway?[VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_botan_01:
Huh? Well, uh... I guess [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she just really came
through for me when I needed h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_botan_02:
Everything was going off the rails. School was a
mess, and my friendships...well, ditto.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_botan_03:
[VAR TRNAME(0000)] was a big help getting
all that sorted out.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_02:
Guau! So [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she helped you out too while [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she was
tackling all the Gyms? That’s awesome![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_03:
[VAR TRNAME(0000)] and I are classmates!
Neighbors back home, too![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_04:
Plus, I said [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she should aim to be a Champion,
and [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she did it! So now I’ve got a Champion bud![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_friend_01: Hold it right there, you two.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_friend_02:
You think YOU’VE got cool friendship origin
stories with [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_friend_03:
They’re nothing compared to what me and h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer
went through! Our friendship’s on another level![VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_botan_06: Um, nobody asked you. Stop trying to flex on us.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_05:
Hahaha! Guess we’re all in the “buds with
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]” club![VAR 0114(0004)]
